title: Confident of outperforming industry in both domestic, global markets: TVS Motor
description: TVS Motor Company predicted growth this fiscal by leveraging new product launches and operational improvements, CEO KN Radhakrishnan reported. The company aimed to outpace industry trends in both domestic and international markets. Plans included expanding in Africa, the Middle East, and Latin America, while addressing challenges like currency devaluation and inflation in specific regions.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
